seeds.target: Es una buena idea intentar respirar despacio.
seeds.known: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.

seeds.target: Cuando sea que te sientas enojado.
seeds.known: Whenever you feel angry.

seeds.target: Ella tenía razón.
seeds.known: She was right.

seeds.target: Quien sea que dijo que sería difícil tenía absolutamente razón.
seeds.known: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.

seeds.target: Es tu turno de llevar la ropa limpia arriba.
seeds.known: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.

seeds.target: El perro está sucio y mojado.
seeds.known: The dog is dirty and wet.

seeds.target: Porque ha estado jugando en el barro.
seeds.known: Because he has been playing in the mud.

seeds.target: Me estoy sintiendo triste en este momento.
seeds.known: I am feeling sad at the moment.

seeds.target: Porque tengo que estar callado.
seeds.known: Because I have got to be quiet.

seeds.target: El final del pueblo.
seeds.known: The end of the village.

seeds.target: La iglesia es fea.
seeds.known: The church is ugly.

seeds.target: La iglesia al otro final del pueblo es fea.
seeds.known: The church at the other end of the village is ugly.

seeds.target: Creo que la iglesia pequeña es muy fea.
seeds.known: I think the small church is very ugly.

seeds.target: Esta toalla no está seca.
seeds.known: This towel isn't dry.

seeds.target: Y estoy demasiado cansado para traer una nueva.
seeds.known: And I'm too tired to fetch a new one.

seeds.target: Tocan música tarde en la noche.
seeds.known: They play music late at night.

seeds.target: Desearía que no tocaran música tan alta.
seeds.known: I wish they wouldn't play such loud music.

seeds.target: Es tan tarde en la noche.
seeds.known: It's so late at night.

seeds.target: ¿Has encontrado el camino por el bosque?
seeds.known: Have you found the path through the wood?

seeds.target: Va hacia abajo a la playa.
seeds.known: It goes down to the beach.
